mainText: My first Apple computer was an Apple II serial # in the 4000s in the late '70s. Many II's, IIGS's, IIc's, IIe's, a plethora of Macs, both desktops and laptops for both work and home, an iPod, and this iPad2, have continued to accompany me each step into the future for over 30 years! May Steve's dream and legacy keep us company as the future continues to unfold!
header: Apple each day to keep mediocracy away
author: Bob
